ISSUE.TITLE: Startup is slow ~ 4 minutes when having lots of Language Resources to update
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.3 Steps to reproduce the problem: The issue was introduced in https://github.com/nopSolutions/nopCommerce/issues/4782 The groupby and sort are slowing down the startup of nopcommerce by several minutes. The slowness is much more visible when using MySql DB. I have done a fix for this: https://github.com/nopSolutions/nopCommerce/pull/4892

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #4893 Added ordering by id to keeping the latest version of the resource
